actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 304 of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to extend the appropriation authorization for fiscal years 1976 and 1977 in order to carry out the provisions of title III relating to marine sanctuaries.

summary.text: Extends the appropriations authorization for the acquisition and operation of marine sanctuaries, under the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972, for an additional two years thru fiscal year 1977.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 304 of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to extend the appropriation authorization for fiscal years 1976 and 1977 in order to carry out the provisions of title III relating to marine sanctuaries.
